entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: print image selfhost by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1418
  • feat: bump ocr to use 4o-mini by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1419

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.1...v2.15.2

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1422
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1423
  • Fix(rtl): better rtl support (#1236) by @levyitay in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1381
  • Add queso fresco to the dairy category by @Felttrip in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1424
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1425
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1430

New Contributors

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.2...v2.15.3

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.15.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1441
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 9 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1427
  • chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 14 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1442
  • Update uk-ua.json by @zaharchenko-yurka in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1456
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1450

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.15.4...v2.15.5
